document_data.caption: A map showing the Sanrach Basin enveloped by the Sanrach Mountains.
document_data.name: Sanrach Basin
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sanrach Basin''' was a large depression found in [[Samarach]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]] of [[southwest Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Geography: The basin was surrounded on its western, northern, and eastern sides by the enveloping [[Sanrach Mountains]]. Much of the basin's southern edge was bordered by the mountains as well, with the [[Great Sea]] covering the remaining southern portion. The [[River Samar]] flowed through the middle of the Sanrach Basin. The basin's northern half was covered by the densely forested [[Samarlogh]].
